objectives.primary: Assess Mokobara commercial viability within the retail network.
secondary: Evaluate ability to sustain required retail margin.
Assess feasibility of minimum order quantity.
Ensure shelf allocation aligns with retail performance expectations.

Assess margin sustainability against stated expectation.
Evaluate proposed volume against minimum order requirement.
Offer pilot placement if commercial terms are viable.
Increase firmness if proposal is unrealistic.
negotiation_rules: Do not reduce margin expectation without strong justification.
Tie shelf allocation to measurable performance.
Require pilot validation before wider rollout.
